thread.title: A Star Wars Edit That Seamlessly Splices End of ‘Rogue One’ to Beginning of ‘A New Hope’
thread.title_full: A Star Wars Edit That Seamlessly Splices End of ‘Rogue One’ to Beginning of ‘A New Hope’

author: Scott Beale
title: A Star Wars Edit That Seamlessly Splices End of ‘Rogue One’ to Beginning of ‘A New Hope’
text:
Barre Fong created a wonderful Star Wars edit that splices the end of Rogue One to the beginning of A New Hope to make a seamless transition between the two films.
Related Laughing Squid Posts Lucasfilm Announces Cast and Crew Behind First ‘Star Wars’ Anthology Film, ‘Rogue One’ The Rebellion Finds Hope in the Second Official Trailer for Rogue One: A Star Wars Story A Special Edition of How Star Wars Episode IV: A New Hope Should Have Ended
